g++   -g -DCHECK_PTHREAD_RETURN_VALUE -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -Wall -Wextra -Werror -Wconversion -Wno-unused-parameter -Wold-style-cast -Woverloaded-virtual -Wpointer-arith -Wshadow -Wwrite-strings -march=native -rdynamic -O0    CMakeFiles/idleconnection_echo2.dir/sortedlist.cc.o  -o ../../bin/idleconnection_echo2 -rdynamic ../../lib/libmuduo_net.a ../../lib/libmuduo_base.a -lpthread -lrt
